thread.title: Albert Lea Holiday Bazaar making changes due to extreme cold | Freeborn/Mower counties | kimt.com
thread.title_full: Albert Lea Holiday Bazaar making changes due to extreme cold | Freeborn/Mower counties | kimt.com

author: Mike Bunge
title: Albert Lea Holiday Bazaar making changes due to extreme cold | Freeborn/Mower counties | kimt.com
text:
ALBERT LEA, Minn. – Thursday’s bitter cold is forcing a series of changes for the Holiday Bazaar in Albert Lea.
Several activities have been moved indoors or adjusted and two have been canceled.
"We’re prioritizing safety while still ensuring the community can enjoy this festive evening," says Holly Babcock, Director of the Albert Lea CVB. "We encourage everyone to dress warmly, share the updates with friends and family, and join us both downtown and at the Skyline Plaza for a night of holiday cheer."
Organizers say the updated schedule in downtown Albert Lea is as follows:
Live Reindeer Visit | 4:00–6:00 PM
New Location: Skyline Plaza, entrance west of Moose Lodge
Photos with Santa | 4:00–6:00 PM
New Location: Ignite Nutrition (132 South Broadway)
Hot Chocolate Stand | 4:00–6:00 PM
New Location: Inside the CVB Office (132 North Broadway)
Grinch Visit | 4:00–6:00 PM
New Location: Inside the CVB Office
Kids Makers Market | 4:00–7:00 PM
Locations: All the Things - Studio & Boutique and The Outlet
Holiday Market | 4:00–8:00 PM
Location: Events at The Broadway
Hat & Glove Handout + Hot Cocoa & Bracelets | 4:00–6:00 PM
Location: Hope Church
Santa Cruise | 6:00 PM
Route: Along Broadway Avenue
Tree Lighting Ceremony | Approximately 6:30 PM
Location: Central Park
Cancellations:
Horse-Drawn Trolley Rides
Albert Lea High School and United Preschool Carolers
